mentions.context: In our case we chose U-Net DNN [4] which turned out to very efficient for biomedical images.

The model was trained with Adam optimizer with learning rate of 0.0005 and batch size of 8. We created check-points each 250 training iterations and we found that 6250 iterations give the best delineation.
